column4: Glad to stop by The County Journal in Charlotte this week to meet with Cindy Gaedert-Gearhart. We discussed how the Paycheck Protection Program and CARES Act grant funding provided assistance to her small business during the pandemic. https://t.co/Dweas2vhug
